radiographic_examinations.findings: Did not reveal the presence of thyroid tissue.
Documented hypoplastic, normally located thyroid glands with volumes between 1.1 – 1.7 ml (normal 3 – 5 ml).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Ultrasonography of the thyroid documented a normal location and size of the mother's gland with discrete irregularities consistent with autoimmune thyroid disease three years after her initial diagnosis.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Did not reveal any structural abnormalities in the renal system.
